metadata.title: CVE-2024-27418 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: mctp: take ownership of skb in mctp_local_outputCurrently, mctp_local_output only takes ownership of skb on success, andwe may leak an skb if mctp_local_output fails in specific states; theskb ownership isn't transferred until the actual output routing occurs.Instead, make mctp_local_output free the skb on all error paths up tothe route action, so it always consumes the passed skb.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
